nodes.text: Carbanti was a producer of Carbanti transceiver packages, the main setup for a T-65B X-wing starfighter's sensor system. The Carbanti transceiver package was comprised of a Fabritech ANs-5d "lock track" full-spectrum transceiver, a Melihat "Multi Imager" dedicated energy receptor, and a Tana Ire Electro-photo receptor.
